operationDescription: Retrieves child folders from within a given root folder.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets
Creates a new folder.  Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Specify the ID and Type of the parent folder where the new folder will be created.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the name you want to give to your new folder.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Add a description for your new folder.

operationDescription: Updates the metadata for a given folder.  Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

parameters.name: {id}
parameters.description: Id of the folder to update.

parameters.name: updateFolderRequest
parameters.description: Specify description for update Folder Request.

operationDescription: Deletes the designated folder.  Deletion will fail if the folder has content.  Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

parameters.name: {id}
parameters.description: Id of the folder to delete.

operationDescription: Returns the folder record with the given id.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

parameters.name: {id}
parameters.description: Id of the folder to retrieve.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of folder. 'Folder' or 'Program'.

operationDescription: Returns a folder record for the given name.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the folder. Not applicable for Programs.

operationDescription:
Returns metadata about lead objects in the target instance, including a list of all fields available for interaction via the APIs. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

Note: This endpoint has been superceded. Use Describe Lead2 endpoint instead.
Returns list of searchable fields on lead objects in the target instance.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead
Syncs a list of leads to the target instance.  Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: Specify the content of the body to upload.

operationDescription: Create lead fields in the target instance.  Required Permissions: Read-Write Schema Custom Field

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: Specify the content of the body to upload.

operationDescription: Delete a list of leads from the destination instance.  Required Permissions: Read-Write Lead

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: Specify the content of the body to upload.

operationDescription: Update metadata for a lead field in the target instance. See update rules here. Required Permissions: Read-Write Schema Standard Field, Read-Write Schema Custom Field

parameters.name: {fieldApiName}
parameters.description: Specify field API name.

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: Specify the content of the body to upload.

operationDescription: Retrieves metadata for single lead field.  Required Permissions: Read-Write Schema Standard Field, Read-Write Schema Custom Field

parameters.name: {fieldApiName}
parameters.description: The API name of lead field.

operationDescription: Returns a list of up to 300 leads based on a list of values in a particular field.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameters.name: filterType
parameters.description: The lead field to filter on. Any custom field (string, email, or integer types only), and any of the following fields are supported: cookies, email, facebookId, id, leadPartitionId, linkedInId, sfdcAccountId, sfdcContactId, sfdcLeadId, sfdcLeadOwnerId, sfdcOpptyId, twitterId.

parameters.name: filterValues
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of lead fields to return for each record

operationDescription: Retrieves a list of leads which are members of the designated program.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameters.name: {programId}
parameters.description: The id of the program to retrieve from.

operationDescription: Retrieves a single lead record through its Marketo id.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameters.name: {leadId}
parameters.description: The Marketo lead id.

operationDescription: Query static list membership for one lead.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Asset

parameters.name: {leadId}
parameters.description: The Marketo lead id.

operationDescription: Retrieves metadata for all lead fields in the target instance.  Required Permissions: Read-Write Schema Standard Field, Read-Write Schema Custom Field

Create export job for search criteria defined via "filter" parameter.  Request returns the "exportId" which is passed as a parameter in subsequent calls to Bulk Export Leads endpoints.  Use Enqueue Export Lead Job endpoint to queue the export job for processing.  Use Get Export Lead Job Status endpoint to retrieve status of export job.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: Specify the content of the body to upload.

operationDescription: Enqueue export job. This will place export job in queue, and will start the job when computing resources become available.  The export job must be in "Created" state.  Use Get Export Lead Job Status endpoint to retrieve status of export job.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead

parameters.name: {exportId}
parameters.description: Id of export batch job.

operationDescription: Returns status of an export job.  Job status is available for 30 days after Completed or Failed status was reached. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead

parameters.name: {exportId}
parameters.description: Id of export batch job.

parameters.name: name

parameters.name: includeTags
parameters.description: Set true to populate program tags.

operationDescription:
Returns a list of campaign records. Required Permissions: Read-Only Campaigns, Read-Write Campaigns

Note: This endpoint has been superceded. Use Get Smart Campaigns endpoint instead.

Returns the record of a campaign by its id. Required Permissions: Read-Only Campaigns, Read-Write Campaigns

Note: This endpoint has been superceded. Use Get Smart Campaign by Id endpoint instead.

parameters.name: {campaignId}
parameters.description: Specify Campaign Id.

operationDescription: Passes a set of leads to a trigger campaign to run through the campaign's flow.  The designated campaign must have a Campaign is Requested: Web Service API trigger, and must be active.  My tokens local to the campaign's parent program can be overridden for the run to customize content. A maximum of 100 leads are allowed per call. Required Permissions: Execute Campaign

parameters.name: {campaignId}
parameters.description: The id of the campaign to trigger.

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: Specify the content of the body to upload.

operationDescription: Remotely schedules a batch campaign to run at a given time.  My tokens local to the campaign's parent program can be overridden for the run to customize content.  When using the "cloneToProgramName" parameter described below, this endpoint is limited to 20 calls per day. Required Permissions: Execute Campaign

parameters.name: {campaignId}
parameters.description: Id of the batch campaign to schedule.

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: Specify the content of the body to upload.
